job_tasks.phrase: take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business problems and translate them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the requirement to link AI solutions to business outcomes and ensure their effective deployment for impact.

job_tasks.phrase: build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions building and applying machine learning models for various predictive and analytical tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to a core Generative AI modeling technique, fine-tuning LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the design and architectural aspects of building AI solutions, which involves software development principles.
General statement implying the development and delivery of functional technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions deploying and maintaining both ML models and GenAI applications, along with MLOps pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the deployment of MLOps pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants
Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way
deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions
passionate data professionals who love working with cutting-edge technologies
Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment

classification.rationale: The job explicitly mentions fine-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) and building generative AI applications. It also emphasizes the development and deployment of MLOps pipelines for these applications, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
